Text: this is the real thing. i have an albini mix on vinyl and this is definitely the albini mix. you can hear a big difference on the solo to heart shaped box and you can hear the differences in all apologies.

This PDF has lots of info on the In Utero recording process:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4408608/Electrical_Audio_-_The_Definitive_Resource

This thing sounds much better than the regular version.  I am saddened by the fact that Nirvana made changes to this masterpiece. My only complaint is about is the lack of the track "Gallons of rubbing alcohol flowing through the strip" which is a great song.
